runs.comm: short of a good length, outside the off stump, the ball moves away late, Gambhir leaves it well alone to the keeper
Cracker! back of a length, on the off, once again the ball moves away quite a bit after pitching. Gambhir lucky not to get an edge as that ball beats him all ends up

Gone! Gambhir comes down the track, quite impudently, to Mohammad Asif and smacks the ball back towards the bowler. It's not well hit but is still travelling quite quickly. Asif lunges to his right in his follow-through and snatches the ball. It pops out of his hand but he bends low and takes a good catch. That is well done.
short of a driving length and on the off, a bit of seam movement in to the right-handed Uthappa, defended back down the pitch
short of a length and outside the off, a bit of movement after the ball bounces, played down to point
short of a length and on the off, punched towards cover and the ball is wide enough of the fielder for the batsmen to pinch a single and ensure that Asif's excellent over is not a maiden
short one banged in on the stumps, Uthappa goes for a pull and doesn't get hold of it. The ball bobs awkwardly to the leg side
short of a good length and on the pads, Sehwag is onto it in a flash and sends the ball over square-leg. That is a cracking shot from someone who has been out of international cricket for a bit
short of a length and on the stumps, defended to the on side, hit softly enough for a quick single
length ball on the stumps, Uthappa picks up the line and length early and uses his wrists to whip the ball over the infield
very full and quite quick, the attempted yorker, this ones coming in as well, Uthappa just manages to dig the ball out
back of a length this time and again quite pacy. The batsman is forced to play but the movement takes the ball past the outside edge

bowled him! Asif pitches it on a perfect length and the ball swings into Sehwag from outside off stump, Sehwag stands in his crease and tries to drive through the off side, he gets beaten by the swing and the thick inside edge crashes into the stumps
pitches just short of a length on leg and middle stump, Yuvraj flicks down to fine leg for a single
tight line and length on off and middle stump, Uthappa leans forward and blocks
good length once again on off stump, Uthappa has no room to play with and he defends towards the leg side, Asif runs across and collects
pitches outside off stump and seams sharply off the pitch into Uthappa who gets into a tangle on the front foot defense

length ball on off and middle stump, Uthappa plays a short-arm pull through midwicket even though the ball wasn't short enough, he finds the gap and the fielder giving chase on a slow outfield makes a hash of the dive on the boundary
pitches on middle stump on a good length and seams across the left-hander, Yuvraj stays on the back foot and tries to defend, the ball brushes the pad and goes through to Akmal
drifts on to leg stump this time, Yuvraj tries to flick but gets hit on the pad for a leg bye to fine leg
Gul over-pitches, that's the first loose ball of the innings, Uthappa cashes it big time, he gets under the ball and lofts it cleanly over mid-on for four
full and straight, Gul was searching for the yorker, Uthappa drives towards mid-off
Gul fires in a bouncer at 143.5 kmh, that was pacy, Uthappa shapes up to play the pull but bails out in the end
quick full toss outside off stump, Uthappa gives Gul the charge and tries to hit through the off side, he gets a faint nick but the ball bounces well short of Akmal

full ball on off and middle stump, Yuvraj tries to hit through mid-on by closing the face of the bat, the ball seams across him and he gets a leading edge that loops up tamely towards Shoaib Malik at mid-off, India are in tatters
played with an open face down to third man for a single
Asif is on fire, he pitches one outside off stump and the ball cuts sharply back into Karthik who gets an inside edge on to his body, splendid bowling
lovely use of the feet, Karthik moves forward and backs away towards leg to make room and lofts a length ball over mid-off for his first run
another one jags viciously into Karthik after pitching on a good length outside off stump, he gets hit high on the thigh
Karthik backs away towards leg and flays his bat at one that is a bit wide outside off stump, he connects superbly and sends the ball flying over cover point
pitches on a good length on off stump and seams away from the right-hander, Uthappa fends at it and gets beaten
full ball on off stump, Uthappa comes forward and drives firmly towards mid-off
short of a length on off and middle stump, Uthappa comes forward but has to re-adjust his stroke into a forward defense because of the length
Gul aims for the blockhole once again, Uthappa pushes it towards extra cover for a single
Karthik comes forward and makes room once again, he drives wide of the fielder at mid-off for one more
short ball but that's far too short, it flies over Uthappa who fails to connect with the hook, a wide is called
full toss, a high full toss on off stump, Uthappa walks into it and drives in the air through the gap at extra cover
defended back to the bowler
Karthik backs away once again and and plays an uppish drive wide of the fielder at mid-off, excellent placement, he's timed that well but the outfield is on the slower side
Asif replies with the bouncer, Karthik backs away and tries to chip it over Akmal but it doesn't come off
Asif strays too far outside off stump, that's the second wide of the match

Asif has his fourth! The ball cuts sharply back into Karthik who tries to defend without moving his feet, the ball hits Karthik's elbow and crashes into the stumps, what an awesome spell this has been
pitches on a good length wide outside off stump, under normal circumstances a batsman would have tried to whack that over point, Dhoni decides to let it go
Asif finishes his spell with a good length ball outside off, Dhoni lets it go.
loud appeal for lbw, Uthappa got an inside edge on that
full and fast outside off stump, Dhoni tries to drive but gets beaten for pace
Arafat strays on to leg stump, Dhoni flicks off his pads to the square leg boundary, the Indian fans cheer themselves hoarse, they haven't had much to cheer about so far
good length ball on off stump, pushed off the back foot towards cover for a single
Uthappa leans forward and pushes the ball into the vacant region towards midwicket and mid-on, Arafat has to chase after it and the batsmen sprint through for two
pitches on a good length outside off stump and seams away from Uthappa who gets drawn forward and prods at it, the ball beats the outside edge
what a start, the ball pitches on middle and off and seams across Dhoni who is comprehensively beaten on the drive
wide outside off stump this time, Dhoni slashes at it but can't make contact
Tanvir is angling it across the right-hander, Dhoni tries to cut but gets beaten once again
this time Dhoni decides to let it go as the ball pitches on off stump and seams across him
Dhoni gets completely squared up by one that pitches on leg and seams across him, the ball hits the outside edge and flies through backward point
Uthappa tries to drive through the line but the seam movement induces another outside edge that runs past backward point
strays on to leg stump and hits Dhoni on the thigh for  a leg bye
awesome shot, he walks down the pitch and lofts Arafat powerfully over the long-off boundary, that's the first six of the innings
Arafat drops it a fraction shot and Uthappa pulls through midwicket for two more
massive hit, too short from Arafat and Uthappa swivels and pulls him emphatically off the front foot into the midwicket stands
Arafat replies with the yorker outside off stump which beats Uthappa
Uthappa walks down the pitch and lofts Arafat to long-on
Tanvir pitches the ball outside leg stump and strays further down, it's called wide
pitches on leg and middle stump, Dhoni drops it on the off side with soft hands and calls for a quick single
pitches on a length on leg and middle stump, the ball stops on Uthappa who pushes it towards long-on for one more
good length delivery on off stump, played off the back foot towards cover point
pitches on middle stump and angles sharply across Uthappa who gets beaten on the front-foot defense
this time the line is a little straighter and the length a little fuller which allows Uthappa to drive to long-on off the front foot
full delivery on middle and off, Dhoni comes forward and pushes towards mid-off for a single
dropped a little short on middle stump, played through square leg off the back foot
too short once again and Uthappa waits on the back foot and uses the width to cut through backward point for four, superb shot
driven firmly past Afridi who gets fingertips on to a difficult caught and bowled chance
flighted delivery outside off stump, Uthappa gets on to the front foot and plays a blazing cover drive for the second boundary of the over
defended on the off side off the back foot
bowled quick and flat on off stump, Uthappa cuts between backward point and short third man for a single

gone! the angle works for Tanvir, he pitches it on middle and takes it across Uthappa who pokes at it with the bat away from his body, Akmal pouches the faint edge, that's a huge blow for India for Uthappa was doing all the scoring
he inside edges one down to fine leg to get off the mark
Dhoni lunges forward and defends towards the off side
Dhoni moves forward to a good length delivery and runs it down towards Asif at third man with an open face
he pitches the bouncer outside off stump, Pathan lets it go
Pathan tries to drive through the off side but the angle into the left-hander forces an inside edge on to the pad
Dhoni gets an outside edge that runs fine but Salman Butt dives at short third man and saves the boundary
Pathan makes room and plays the square drive through cover point
Afridi drags it short and Dhoni pulls to wide long-on for a single
full toss on middle stump, Pathan drives it back to Afridi
Pathan gets beaten outside off stump, Akmal whips off the bails but Pathan is safe
Pathan waits on the back foot and cuts a flat delivery past the fielder at short third man, Imran Nazir gives chase and drags it back just inside the boundary
pitches on a good length outside off stump, Pathan is late on the drive and gets beaten
Pathan times the off-drive splendidly but Malik runs to his right and dives to make the save, that would have been four had the ball got past him
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
short and wide outside the off stump, Dhoni waits on the back foot, frees his arms and cuts it fiercely over point for four
played off the pads through square leg for a single
full toss on off and middle stump, Pathan paddles it in the air through square leg
Pathan steps down the track, takes it on the full and drives to long-on
cut towards backward point for a sharp single
Pathan tries to drive but gets beaten by a quicker ball
that's on the roof! Pathan uses his feet, steps down the pitch and with a full swing of his arms, lofts the ball over the midwicket boundary
and again, Pathan charges Afridi and lofts him cleanly over the long-on boundary this time, the crowd goes beserk
bowled him! Afridi fires in the quicker ball, Pathan tries to defend but gets beaten and the ball clips leg stump, that's the end of that little contest
full toss on off and middle stump, Dhoni pushes it firmly past Arafat and he's timed that so well that long-on has no chance to cut that off
Arafat drops it short on leg stump, Dhoni swivels and pulls it down to fine leg where Umar Gul jumps up and watches the ball sail over his head, six more
full ball on middle stump, Dhoni pulls it through midwicket for a single
short of a length on off and middle stump, defended on the back foot towards Arafat
a massive appeal for caught behind, the ball cuts back sharply into Harbhajan who hardly moves his feet, the ball cuts him in half and it sounded like there was an edge
pushed off the back foot towards cover point for a quick single

bowled him! Harbhajan tries to slog Afridi across the line, he misses completely but Afridi hits the stumps, that's the second wicket that India have lost soon after the rain break, Uthappa was the first
cut to deep point for a single
Dhoni leans forward and drives to cover for one
Agarkar drives firmly off the front foot to long-off
flighted delivery on off stump, Dhoni drives firmly towards long-off
slightly shorter in length, Agarkar pulls to the fielder on the midwicket boundary
Agarkar backs away and cuts high and in the air over backward point, he's placed that far enough from Misbah in the deep to reach the boundary
and again, he backs away to make room, Gul bowls it short and Agarkar cuts wide of the man at third man for four more
fuller length from Gul outside off stump, Agarkar tries to smash it down the ground but gets beaten
Gul fires it into the block hole, Agarkar jabs down at it and gets an inside edge to short fine leg
superb ball, quick and in the block hole outside off stump, Dhoni tries to hit it down the ground but the ball squeezes under his bat
defended back to the bowler on the back foot, Agarkar sets off from the non-strikers end, Gul picks up, tunrs around and throws at the stumps, he misses and concedes an over throw
full ball on off stump, Dhoni tries to smash it out of the ground but gets too much under it, he skies it high in the air to Younis Khan at long-off who takes a well-judged catch
Sreesanth swings and misses, Akmal collects the ball and hits the stumps, no chance of an over throw this time
driven down to long-on for a single, fine bowling from Arafat, keeping it up in the block hole
Agarkar tries to hit a full ball through the off side but gets an inside edge to short fine leg
Sreesanth charges Arafat but misses the ball, he continues running because it's the last ball of the innings but Akmal calmly collects the ball and hits the stumps at the batsman's end
